/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with a large white cloud casting a soft light over the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. Trees and streetlights line the sides of the road, adding to the urban feel of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of looking up at the cityscape.
